title: Ensuring an Equitable Pandemic Response and Recovery

enrichment.summary: This executive order creates a task force to address the unequal impact of COVID-19 on communities of color and other underserved groups by improving data collection, resource allocation, and communication. It directs federal agencies to assess and adapt their pandemic response efforts to promote equity and strengthen support for the hardest-hit communities.
potential_concerns: The effectiveness of the Task Force may be limited by insufficient funding or resource allocation from agencies.
Data collection efforts might face privacy and legal challenges, delaying timely recommendations and actions.
Equity-focused modifications to pandemic response could be politicized or resisted by some agencies or local governments.
The diverse and broad membership of the Task Force may slow decision-making and complicate consensus building.
Communities with multiple overlapping vulnerabilities might still be underserved if data intersectionality is not adequately addressed.
